document.full_text: in the hours before a budget deal, hundreds of bewildered civil war buffs worried about what was shaping up as a historically inaccurate reenactment of the bombardment of fort sumter.
document.title: all of a war's trappings, with accuracy at stake
lines_and_colors: in the hours before a budget deal, hundreds of bewildered civil war buffs worried about what was shaping up as a historically inaccurate reenactment of the bombardment of fort sumter.
